hero.name: Ahmed Bousrih
hero.subtitle: Software Engineer & Web Developer
hero.description: I am a passionate Software Engineering graduate from ESIEA Paris and EPI Sousse, dedicated to building scalable web applications and delivering innovative solutions. Outside of development, I enjoy sharpening my mind as a chess enthusiast.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know more about my background and expertise

intro.title: Software Engineering Graduate
intro.description: I am a Software Engineering graduate from ESIEA Paris and EPI Sousse, passionate about designing and developing scalable, innovative applications. I thrive on solving complex problems and turning ideas into real-world solutions. My academic journey and hands-on experience have equipped me with a strong foundation in modern technologies and software development principles, enabling me to contribute to impactful projects that make a difference.

education.title: Education
education.keyCourses: Key courses: System Programming, Network Design, Application Architecture, Database Management, FullStack Development
